about_the_game:
As Darkness engulfs their hometown, Del and Prod embark on a journey to find their remaining family member.
Join in on the adventure!

Mirage in Darkness is a 2D puzzle platformer adventure game with a rich story and a bit of an eerie twist.
You play as Del, a young kid who will jump, climb, crouch, solve puzzles and make decisions along the way as well as... whine and cry about his predicament.
Help him grow up and learn to survive on his own! Sometimes it will be all about timing, other times he will have to use his brains.

Game Highlights:
2D platformer adventure game packed with puzzles to solve.
Items to collect and use.
Multiple choice encounters with different outcomes.
Bratty but somewhat lovable main character.
